title: New: La Plage – Mark
body:
New Honeymoon signees **La Plage **have been making some substantial waves over the past month with their infectiously captivating summery guitar pop.

New track _Mark_ is a far cry from their bouncing debut _Rendez Vous_, replacing the jumping bass and drums with a subdued atmosphere that fully encapsulates. It’s a bleary affair that stays fairly flat dynamically, but drifts around  in a way that is seriously hard to ignore. Stream _Mark_ below as well as their debut _Rendez Vous_ below:
